overview: Featuring the Shocklosers from Super Science Showcase, this new adventure finds the gang shipped off to Camp Analog-- a summer camp that specializes in "rehabilitating" young people with destructive tech habits-- after a prank for their online channel goes too far. But everything is not quite what it seems at Camp Analog, and the Shocklosers find themselves fighting the established conformity to preserve who they really are.
title: The Shocklosers Survive Camp Analog
